forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 26C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 78F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 26C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 78F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 25C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 77F. ESE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
